item.title: Facebook Page & Facebook Ads Made as FUN: 10 DAYS Challenge
item.description: Step by step Facebook ads & Instagram ads course for beginners (ready for ios 14.5+ restrictions) - Accept our 10 days challenge and learn how to set up Facebook business page & Facebook business manager. Install Facebook Pixel ready for iOS 14.5+ restrictions. Use Facebook Creator studio. Launch your first Facebook read ads & Facebook engagement campaigns. Generate leads with Facebook lead generation ads. This Facebook ads course includes essential info so you can prep for the Facebook Pixel API for iOS14.
